Bétika (onye a mụrụ Brigitte Houedji, Grand-Bassam, Ivory Coast) bụ onye na-agụ egwu na onye na-eme ihe nkiri si Ivory Coast.
A mụrụ ya n'obodo bụbu isi obodo France nke Grand-Bassam, n'ebe ọwụwa anyanwụ nke isi obodo Abidjan, Houedji bụ onye ikpeazụ na "Le Famesol", nke emere na Grand-Bussam n'afọ 1987
Site na mmasị na nkà ya na egwu, ọ na-egwuri egwu ma na-eme njem na ndị otu François Lougah na Antoinette Konan n'otu n'otu
N'afọ 1996, Bétika wepụtara abọm mbụ ya, "Ma Vie" ("My Life" na Bekee)
N'afọ 2000, o wepụtara abọm nke abụọ ya, Millenium 2000 Ah les Hommes!
N'afọ 2005, o wepụtara abọm nke atọ ya, Missié Pardon (Fakaloh)
Site n'ihe odide ya, Bétika na-akwado ịhụnanya na ịhụnanya n'etiti di na nwunye
Egwú ya na-ekpuchi ịhụnanya n'etiti ụmụ mmadụ n'ozuzu
Site n'ịmata, ndị na-akwado egwu Ivorian akpọwo ya "Láavocate de l'Amour" ("The Advocate of Love").
N'afọ 2006, Bétika meriri iko atọ, gụnyere onyinye "Georges Taï Benson" na Ivorian Music Awards
A kpọkwara ya nwanyị kachasị mma na mmemme ahụ maka abụ ya "Fakaloh".
